original_text: So he went down and dipped himself in the Jordan seven times, as the man of God had told him, and his flesh was restored and became clean like that of a young boy.
korean_text: 나아만이 이에 내려가서 하나님의 사람의 말대로 요단 강에 일곱 번 몸을 잠그니 그의 살이 어린 아이의 살 같이 회복되어 깨끗하게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: and dipped himself in the Jordan seven times
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요단강에서 일곱 번 몸을 담갔다

sentences.original_text: as the man of God had told him
like that of a young boy
